About

As an undergraduate pursuing a Bachelor of Software Engineering with Honors at The Open University of Sri Lanka, I am exploring Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Data Science. I am actively developing projects focused on full-stack development and integrating AI features, particularly within the MERN stack. My technical interests include exploring AI-driven databases and mastering concepts in data-driven technologies. Currently, I am working on MindConnex, an article-sharing platform.

Looking forward to new opportunities and exciting collaborations!
